DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy metoprolol tartrate compare carvedilol heart rate control patient atrial fibrillation rapid ventricular rate .
DOC.criteria: Permanent atrial fibrillation Baseline ventricular rate ( prior treatment ) > 110 bpm History accessory tract reentry tachycardia Ejection fraction < 35 % history NYHA Class III/IV stage C/D heart failure Acute coronary syndrome , percutaneous coronary intervention , cardiac surgery past 2 month ChildPugh class B C hepatic dysfunction Uncontrolled hypertension Thyroid disease Intolerance betablockers History lung disease result hospitalization past year
